title: Payday 2: Free In-game Items Giveaway
description: OVERKILL is giving away free in-game items for Payday 2! You just need to complete some easy steps to unlock several in-game items including masks, hats and more!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Select your favorite in-game items.
3. Complete the steps to unlock your in-game items!

title: Dreadnought: Free $10 Gift Pack Steam Keys
description: Claim your free $10 Gift Pack Steam Key for Dreadnought! Please note the base game Dreadnought (free to play) is required to play this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Install the base game on Steam first.
2. Login into your Alienwarearena and click the button to unlock your key.
3. Redeem your key on Steam.

title: Battle for the Galaxy Ice Bastion Pack Steam Key

title: Overstep Skin Key Giveaway
description: Grab this key and unlock an exclusive skin for Overstep! Please note you must redeem this key in-game.
instructions:

2. Login into your Alienwarearena account and grab your key.
3. Open the game and click on the main menu and enter the code.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Drifters Loot the Galaxy: 3 Steam Key Giveaways
description: The Drifters Loot the Galaxy team is giving away multiple goodies on their website for free. You can sign up to their newsletter to get 1000 Zenith and a skin ($10 value) plus you can score exclusive skins!
instructions:
1. Go to https://gleam.io/siNie/drifters-loot-the-galaxy-ziggy-giggler-skin to unlock a Skin!
2. Go to https://gleam.io/zeang/drifters-loot-the-galaxy-halley-stone-faced-skin to unlock another skin.
3. Go to https://www.driftersthegame.com, scroll down and sign up to unlock 1000 Zenith.
